title: Israeli airstrikes target Hezbollah in Lebanon after deadly rocket attack
'Created by weak US President & VP': Trump blames Biden, Harris for Hezbollah attacks on Israel killing 12
content: Donald Trump attributed the recent Hezbollah rocket strike on a soccer field in northern Israel, which killed 12 children, to the perceived weakness of President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris. While Biden's team expressed support for Israel, Hezbollah denied involvement in the attack. The tragedy heightened tensions and drew sharp political criticism.
summary: Donald Trump attributed the recent Hezbollah rocket strike on a soccer field in northern Israel, which killed 12 children, to the perceived weakness of President Joe Biden and Vice President Kamala Harris. While Biden's team expressed support for Israel, Hezbollah denied involvement in the attack. The tragedy heightened tensions and drew sharp political criticism.

title: Watch: New Manchester Airport video captures moments before man 'kicked' in head by police officer
Britain is 'broke and broken', newly-elected Labour govt claims
content: The British government declared the country financially troubled, citing a £20 billion shortfall. Newly-elected Labour plans to blame the previous Conservative government for unfunded commitments. Finance Minister Rachel Reeves is set to present a fiscal review in parliament, targeting financial transparency and realistic budget plans.
summary: The British government declared the country financially troubled, citing a £20 billion shortfall. Newly-elected Labour plans to blame the previous Conservative government for unfunded commitments. Finance Minister Rachel Reeves is set to present a fiscal review in parliament, targeting financial transparency and realistic budget plans.

title: 'They eat head, whole body ...': Fishermen face growing threat from bearded fireworms devouring their catches
'World first': Juice spacecraft to flyby by Earth and Moon, then slingshot to Jupiter
California Park wildfire destroys more than 3.5 lakh acres, becomes largest in US
content: The Park Fire, burning about 90 miles north of Sacramento, had destroyed 134 structures as of Saturday afternoon. Authorities arrested a man on Thursday, suspecting that he started the fire by pushing a flaming car into a gully on Wednesday afternoon.
summary: The Park Fire, burning about 90 miles north of Sacramento, had destroyed 134 structures as of Saturday afternoon. Authorities arrested a man on Thursday, suspecting that he started the fire by pushing a flaming car into a gully on Wednesday afternoon.

title: Korean War anniversary: North Korea vows 'total destruction' of enemies
content: North Korea recently threatened to 'totally destroy' the US and South Korea if war breaks out, as ordered by Kim Jong Un. This announcement came during the 71st anniversary of the Korean War armistice. Military officials accused the US and South Korea of provoking nuclear war and pledged to strengthen their defense readiness.
summary: North Korea recently threatened to 'totally destroy' the US and South Korea if war breaks out, as ordered by Kim Jong Un. This announcement came during the 71st anniversary of the Korean War armistice. Military officials accused the US and South Korea of provoking nuclear war and pledged to strengthen their defense readiness.

title: Devastating wildfires in Northern California: Why West is burning and what we can do
Did Kamala Harris make ‘Simpsons’ video at Comic-Con? The real story behind the clip
Priti Patel joins race to become UK Conservative party leader
content: Priti Patel announced her candidacy to lead the opposition Conservative Party, aiming to replace Rishi Sunak. Patel, the fifth contender, emphasized unity with the slogan 'Unite to Win.' She called for putting the country above personal interests. Patel's announcement adds to a list of prominent candidates. The new leader will be announced on November 2 after multiple rounds of selection.
summary: Priti Patel announced her candidacy to lead the opposition Conservative Party, aiming to replace Rishi Sunak. Patel, the fifth contender, emphasized unity with the slogan 'Unite to Win.' She called for putting the country above personal interests. Patel's announcement adds to a list of prominent candidates. The new leader will be announced on November 2 after multiple rounds of selection.

'On day 1, I will fire...': 10 things Donald Trump said at Bitcoin 2024 conference
content: ​Former president and Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump addressed Saturday Bitcoin 2024 conference in Nashville taking an opposite stand that earlier when he declared bitcoin was not money. At the conference, he said America will be the crypto capital in the coming days if he is back to the White House. Bitcoin stands for freedom, sovereignty, and independence from government, coercion, and control, Trump said.
summary: ​Former president and Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump addressed Saturday Bitcoin 2024 conference in Nashville taking an opposite stand that earlier when he declared bitcoin was not money. At the conference, he said America will be the crypto capital in the coming days if he is back to the White House. Bitcoin stands for freedom, sovereignty, and independence from government, coercion, and control, Trump said.

title: JD Vance's old friend leaks shocking email exchange: 'He wishes Sofia all the best'
content: JD Vance, Donald Trump's running mate in the upcoming election, was once a Trump hater and Vance's campaign has not tried to put a fig-leaf onto it. They said Vance's opinion about Trump evolved over the ages. Now an old friend of Vance, Sofia Nelson, who identifies himself as a transgender, has leaked his old private mail exchanges with Vance -- to the New York Times hoping that voters would be now well informed about Mr Vance -- who already is at the center of a major controversy for his past remark on 'childless cat ladies'.
summary: JD Vance, Donald Trump's running mate in the upcoming election, was once a Trump hater and Vance's campaign has not tried to put a fig-leaf onto it. They said Vance's opinion about Trump evolved over the ages. Now an old friend of Vance, Sofia Nelson, who identifies himself as a transgender, has leaked his old private mail exchanges with Vance -- to the New York Times hoping that voters would be now well informed about Mr Vance -- who already is at the center of a major controversy for his past remark on 'childless cat ladies'.

title: Andy Roddick says it doesn't matter if Trump was hit by bullet or sharpnel because...
content: ​Tennis legend Andy Roddick said it does not matter whether former president Donald Trump was hit by a bullet or a sharpnel as it does not change the fact that there was an assassination attempt on him. The comment came as FBI director Christopher Wray earlier this week expressed some doubt over what actually grazed Trump's right year at his rally in Pennsylvania. FBI, however, clarified later that Trump was injured by a bullet.
summary: ​Tennis legend Andy Roddick said it does not matter whether former president Donald Trump was hit by a bullet or a sharpnel as it does not change the fact that there was an assassination attempt on him. The comment came as FBI director Christopher Wray earlier this week expressed some doubt over what actually grazed Trump's right year at his rally in Pennsylvania. FBI, however, clarified later that Trump was injured by a bullet.

title: Astrologer's 2020 post on Kamala running for President viral. 'Trump winning?' Internet asks her
content: ​A 2020 post by clairvoyant Amy Tripp, who goes by the name Starheal, has gone viral as in the post it was predicted that Kamala Harris will be running for the president post in 2024. "Kamala Harris will be 60 in 4 years. I see her running for Presidenyt in 2024 since this coincides with her Saturn return," the 2020 post read.
summary: ​A 2020 post by clairvoyant Amy Tripp, who goes by the name Starheal, has gone viral as in the post it was predicted that Kamala Harris will be running for the president post in 2024. "Kamala Harris will be 60 in 4 years. I see her running for Presidenyt in 2024 since this coincides with her Saturn return," the 2020 post read.

title: 'Usha Vance used to be appalled by Trump, it was surreal to see her next to him'
content: ​Usha Chilukuri Vance, the Indian-origin wife of senator JD Vance who could be the next vice president, used to be appalled by Donald Trump and it was surreal to see her next to Trump at the Republican National Convention, her old friends told Washington Post. Usha was registered as a Democrat almost a decade ago but was not vocal about politics. Her friends said she was actually repulsed by Trump after his January 6, 2021 action.
summary: ​Usha Chilukuri Vance, the Indian-origin wife of senator JD Vance who could be the next vice president, used to be appalled by Donald Trump and it was surreal to see her next to Trump at the Republican National Convention, her old friends told Washington Post. Usha was registered as a Democrat almost a decade ago but was not vocal about politics. Her friends said she was actually repulsed by Trump after his January 6, 2021 action.

title: Rocket strike kills 11 children and teens in Israeli-controlled Golan Heights, Netanyahu vows revenge
content: A rocket barrage from Lebanon killed nine and wounded 34, including 17 critically, in the Golan Heights. Israel blamed Hezbollah for the attack and is preparing a response. An Israeli airstrike on southern Lebanon killed three Hezbollah members, escalating tension. The conflict between Israel and Hezbollah has intensified since the war in Gaza began after Hamas’ attack on October 7.
summary: A rocket barrage from Lebanon killed nine and wounded 34, including 17 critically, in the Golan Heights. Israel blamed Hezbollah for the attack and is preparing a response. An Israeli airstrike on southern Lebanon killed three Hezbollah members, escalating tension. The conflict between Israel and Hezbollah has intensified since the war in Gaza began after Hamas’ attack on October 7.
